articles.description: A video  called 'so long nerds' was shared posthumously on the YouTube channel Technoblade in which he revealed his name was Alex, 23, from the US.
articles.content:

articles.title: Red Hot Chili Peppers cancel tonight's Glasgow gig due to illness - NME
articles.description: Red Hot Chili Peppers have cancelled their gig at Glasgow's Bellahouston Park tonight (July 1) due to an unspecified illness.
articles.content:
Red Hot Chili Peppers have cancelled their gig in Glasgow tonight (July 1) due to illness.
